physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Enlarged parathyroid gland removed; diagnosed with hyperparathyroidism; history of osteitis fibrosa cystica.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial hyperparathyroidism treated with the removal of one enlarged parathyroid gland; recurrence after 10 years, which resulted in the identification of three enlarged parathyroid glands leading to total parathyroidectomy, thyroidectomy, thymectomy, and parathyroid autograft.
